snippet: Illstyle and Peace Productions presented “IMpossible IZZpossible,” a program that blended hip-hop, tap, ballet and West African dance, at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews Illstyle and Peace Productions dance program IMpossible IZZpossible, featuring Philadelphia company's performances of hip-hop, tap and African dance, at BAM Fisher as part of the BAM Kids series.
lead_paragraph: Illstyle and Peace Productions presented “IMpossible IZZpossible,” a program that blended hip-hop, tap, ballet and West African dance, at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.

headline.print_headline: Hybridized Hip-Hop, Playing to the Kids
headline.seo: Illstyle and Peace’s ‘IMpossible IZZpossible’ at BAM Fisher
headline.main: Hybridized Hip-Hop, Playing to the Kids
